the knee is what type of joint
the knee joint is a hi ##nge type syn ##ov ##ial joint , which mainly allows for flex ##ion and extension ( and a small degree of medial and lateral rotation ) . he shape of the knee joint means that it is relatively weak , and so it relies on muscles and ligament ##s to ensure stability . a ##Â© 2015 teach ##me ##ana ##tom ##y . com [ cc - by - nc - n ##d 4 . 0 ] . fig 1 . 0 a a broad overview of the bony structures of the knee joint .
